name: Cloud Console
description: Direct link into my GCP projects for quick IAM checks and service tweaks.

name: Run Admin
description: Cloud Run admin surface for redeploys, environment variables, and traffic splits.

name: Logs & Metrics
description: One place to open Cloud Logging and Monitoring dashboards without digging through menus.

name: Artifact Registry
description: Container images and build artifacts I keep for deployments and rollbacks.

name: Notes & Docs
description: Personal docs, runbooks, and tiny utilities served from Cloud Storage.
